   I am currently working on a version of neat to supervise neat, by 
way o=
f manipulation of the parameters on a generation by generation 
basis for t=
he purpose of attempting to accelerate the integral of the 
fitness of the =
underlying neat task (UNT). The byproduct would be the 
evolution of a supe=
rvisor genome.

   My current thoughts regarding inputs to the supervisor a=
re as 
follows:

1) normalized log of UNT generation #,
2) last UNT generat=
ion highest fitness (HF),
3) last UNT generation HF accum,
4) # of generati=
ons since last change of HF of UNT,
5) average of UNT generation HF,
6) slo=
pe of average of UNT generation HF (last 2 points),
7) slope of HF accum (l=
ast 2 points).

   Does anyone have any thoughts regarding the contemplated=
 inputs, 
and/or suggestions for possible other candidate inputs?

   Thoug=
htful suggestions are always appreciated!

Thanks,
   Andy
